short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open random content to stay entertained!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Random Content Button opens a random link from a list of user supplied links. If you're bored, just right click anywhere on your current webpage, click "RANDOM CONTENT," and be whisked away!
